source:
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Duzal Meyean the Steady seeks an exceptional Disciple of the Hand to assist his team of crafts...birds in the creation of delicate components.
※The crafting portion of this quest is recommended for Disciples of the Hand level 15 and above, and the battle portion for Disciples of War or Magic level 48 and above.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
※本クエストは、クラフタークラス：レベル15以上、
　バトルクラス：レベル48以上推奨です。 

エカトル実験場の匠人のドゥザル・メイェアンは、冒険者に難しい依頼があるようだ。

source:
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_SEQ_01<tab>Duzal Meyean has asked you to synthesize high-quality disposal unit components, that crews may safely relieve themselves aboard the <var 1A 02 /var>Dezul Qualan<var 1A 01 /var>. Proper equipment to craft these items, however, is only found at the Diamond Forge in Revenant's Toll. Speak with forgewife Fyrbryda about receiving permission to utilize the facilities.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_SEQ_01<tab>※本クエストには「<var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var><var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> レベルアジャスト」が、
　設定されています。

匠人のドゥザル・メイェアンから「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　8115)) 01 /var>」の製作を依頼された。モードゥナのレヴナンツトールにある工房「ダイヤモンドフォージ」の「フィルブリダ」に、製作施設の使用許可をもらおう。

source: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_SEQ_02<tab>Fyrbryda's rules for the forge are simple: one, all materials brought inside must be inspected for contraband, and two, if anyone wishes to make use of the facilities, they must first provide a generous contribution to the Revenant's Toll chapter of the Adventurers' Guild. Currently, the guild has need of morbol vines, which will be used to craft stronger ropes for the miners who scale the mountains of Mor Dhona. Travel to the Tangle and slay a resident morbol for its feelers.
target: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_SEQ_02<tab>フィルブリダと話した。製作施設を使う条件として、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A0A01 /var>」を調達しよう。「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A0A01 /var>」はタングル湿林にいる「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) ((　237)) 01 /var>」を討伐することで、まれに得られるらしい。

source: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_SEQ_03<tab>You have obtained an exceptionally thick morbol vine. Return it to Fyrbryda before another miner snaps his neck. Also, do not forget to submit the disposal unit component materials to the forgewife for inspection.
target: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A0A01 /var>を入手した。工房「ダイヤモンドフォージ」の「フィルブリダ」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A0A01 /var>」と「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A0901 /var>」を渡し、製作施設の使用許可をもらおう。

source:
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_SEQ_04<tab>Fyrbryda has granted you access to the Diamond Forge's crafting facilities. Use the materials given to you by Duzal Meyean and inspected by Fyrbryda to synthesize high-quality disposal unit components. Once completed, return to Ehcatl with the items.

※In the event that the status <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Facility Access: Specialization<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> wears off or the synthesis ends in failure, you may try again by speaking with Fyrbryda.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_SEQ_04<tab>製作施設の準備が整った。「<var 28 ((Item)) F21F8B01 /var>」をもとに「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F21FB301 /var>」を2つ製作し、エカトル実験場の「匠人のドゥザル・メイェアン」に納品しよう。

※バフステータス「製作施設：専門工作」が終了した場合や、「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8075)) 01 /var>」を失った場合は、再びフィルブリダに話しかけましょう。バフステータスと材料が付与され、再挑戦が可能になります。

source: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_SEQ_05<tab>You have delivered the disposal unit components to Duzal Meyean. The veteran is deeply grateful for your efforts, which will ensure that the <var 1A 02 /var>Dezul Qualan<var 1A 01 /var> is not plagued by unpleasant odors. When next you are willing to contribute to their cause, he looks forward to working with you again.
target: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_SEQ_05<tab>匠人のドゥザル・メイェアンに<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F21FB301 /var>を納品した。彼の職人のカンは的中し、燃料排出機構の重大な瑕疵が発覚した。だが冒険者のもたらした精巧な部材なら、その問題は回避できるという。大いなる高みへと到る道は、こうした地道な技術改良の積み重ねによって拓かれるのかもしれない。

source: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Fyrbryda in Revenant's Toll.
target: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_TODO_00<tab>レヴナンツトールのフィルブリダと話す

source: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_TODO_01<tab>Obtain a thick morbol vine from a morbol in the Tangle.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_TODO_01<tab>タングル湿林で<var 28 ((BNpcName)) ((　237)) 01 /var>からまれに得られる
<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A0A01 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_TODO_02<tab>Present the disposal unit component materials and the morbol vine to Fyrbryda.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_TODO_02<tab>レヴナンツトールのフィルブリダに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A0A01 /var>と
<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A0901 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_TODO_03<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize disposal unit components <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var>)) ((Deliver the disposal unit components <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var> to Duzal Meyean the Steady)) /var>.
target: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_TODO_03<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((製作手帳 蛮族クエストLv15：<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　8115)) 01 /var>を製作)) ((匠人のドゥザル・メイェアンに<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　8115)) 01 /var>を納品)) /var>

source: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_DUZALMEYEAN_000_000<tab>Caw! Quick hands, I seek. Feathered, featherless, I care not. My brethren, I love, but all talons, they are. Grace, they have not. Perfection, they cannot achieve.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_DUZALMEYEAN_000_000<tab>……おまえさん、いいところに来てくれたッァ！
高品質の「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　8115)) 01 /var>」を2つ頼めるかッァ？
チィと、困ったことになっているんだッァ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_DUZALMEYEAN_000_010<tab>Tasked with crafting of <var 1A 02 /var>Dezul Qualan<var 1A 01 /var>'s disposal unit, we are. If filter not perfect, our waste will collect. Thick with fumes, air will become. Fall ill, crew will! Caw!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_DUZALMEYEAN_000_010<tab>……緊急時の、燃料排出機構の動きが少し悪いッィ！
原因は機構内部の金属製ワイヤーだッァ。
コイツが太すぎて、干渉が起きたんだッァ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_DUZALMEYEAN_000_020<tab>Tasked with crafting of <var 1A 02 /var>Dezul Qualan<var 1A 01 /var>'s disposal unit, we are. If deodorizing agent not perfect, persist, odors will. Reluctant, crew will become. Burst, bowels will! Caw!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_DUZALMEYEAN_000_020<tab>……緊急時の、燃料排出機構の動きが少し悪いッィ！
原因は青燐水の異常燃焼を防ぐ中和剤だッァ。
コイツの効力が想定より低かったんだッァ。

source: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_DUZALMEYEAN_000_030<tab>Tasked with crafting of <var 1A 02 /var>Dezul Qualan<var 1A 01 /var>'s disposal unit, we are. If connectors not perfect, leak, pipes will. Damage other components, our waste will. Disaster, there will be. Caw!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_DUZALMEYEAN_000_030<tab>……緊急時の、燃料排出機構の動きが少し悪いッィ！
原因は接続部分に使われているストリングだッァ。
コイツの強度が、水準を下回ったんだッァ。

source: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_DUZALMEYEAN_000_040<tab>Materials, I will provide, but to craft the components, proper facilities, you will need. Seek Fyrbryda in Revenant's Toll, you must. Though spurned, an Ixal is, welcome to use gifts of art and knowledge, featherless ones are.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_DUZALMEYEAN_000_040<tab>……材料は渡すから、レヴナンツトールの、
工房「ダイヤモンドフォージ」で製作してみてくれるかッァ！
「フィルブリダ」って女に頼めばいいッィ。

source: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_DUZALMEYEAN_000_041<tab>To the Diamond Forge, you must go. To Fyrbryda, you must speak. The gifts of art, she tends. Guide you to perfection, she shall. Caw caw!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_DUZALMEYEAN_000_041<tab>……このままでも、動作はするかもしれないッィ！
だが俺のカンは、無視するなと言っているッゥ……！

source: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_DUZALMEYEAN_000_050<tab>To the Diamond Forge, you must go. To Fyrbryda, you must speak. Guide you to perfection, she shall. Caw!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_DUZALMEYEAN_000_050<tab>……このままでも、動作はするかもしれないッィ！
だが俺のカンは、無視するなと言っているッゥ……！
材料を持って「レヴナンツトール」に向かってくれッェ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_FYRBRYDA_000_060<tab>We're busy here at the Diamond Forge, so I won't waste time mincing words. My rules here are simple. Follow them, and you are free to use the facilities for as long as you need.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_FYRBRYDA_000_060<tab>いらっしゃい、冒険者さん。
ふふっ……来てくれてうれしいわ。
この施設を使いたいのよね？

source: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_FYRBRYDA_000_061<tab>Rule one─aught that passes through those doors must be inspected. I will have no contraband within my walls. Period. Rule two─you make a contribution of my choice to the Revenant's Toll chapter of the Adventurers' Guild. No questions asked. No exceptions.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_FYRBRYDA_000_061<tab>だったら、ちょっと頼まれてほしいことがあるの。
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A0A01 /var>」を持ってきて。

source: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_FYRBRYDA_000_062<tab>If that suits you, journey to the Tangle and collect a thick vine from a morbol. It will be used to make sturdy rope, that miners can more safely scale the rugged crags of Mor Dhona.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_FYRBRYDA_000_062<tab>加工すると丈夫なロープになるのよ。
ふふっ……外の建物のあいだに綱が張ってあるでしょ？
あれで綱渡りする冒険者がいるから、強いのに替えたくて。

source: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_FYRBRYDA_000_063<tab>If it doesn't, you can leave, and let the broken backs of countless miners weigh on your conscience.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_FYRBRYDA_000_063<tab>ここレヴナンツトールの南西、「タングル湿林」にいる、
「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) ((　237)) 01 /var>」を討伐して手に入れてきて。
1体倒しただけじゃ無理かもしれないから、根気よくね。

source: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_FYRBRYDA_000_070<tab>Journey to the Tangle and slay a morbol for one of its vines. Do that, and the facilities are yours to use as you see fit.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_FYRBRYDA_000_070<tab>ふふっ……<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A0A01 /var>をお願いね。
対価として奉仕するのが、ここを使うための決まりごとよ。

source: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_FYRBRYDA_000_090<tab>Quick now, before another miner meets an abrupt end.
target: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_FYRBRYDA_000_090<tab>おかえりなさい、成果はどうだった？

source: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_FYRBRYDA_000_095<tab>Excellent! This will make for fine rope. As for your materials...though obviously of questionable origin, I have found naught the guild has deemed forbidden. Proceed, then.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_FYRBRYDA_000_095<tab>ありがとう、助かっちゃったわ。
ふふっ……もちろん製作のための準備はできてるわよ。
材料はお返しするから、あとは存分に腕をふるってね。

source: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_FYRBRYDA_000_100<tab>If you require more time or materials, do not hesitate to ask, for today I am in your debt. I did not mention this before, but my dearest childhood friend will soon take up mining, and the rope we will make shall serve him well. For the peace of mind you have given me, it is the least I can do.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_FYRBRYDA_000_100<tab>ふふっ……材料が足りなくなっちゃった？
それとも施設の使用時間を延長したい？
そんなときには、遠慮なく私に言ってね。

source: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_FYRBRYDA_100_100<tab>I suppose this is farewell. If aught should happen to your work while on the road, do not hesitate to return here for additional materials, for this day I am in your debt. You see, I have just received word that my dear friend was in an accident...and were it not for his morbol vine rope, he would have fallen to his death like the others. Though he is injured, he will live to mine another day.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_FYRBRYDA_100_100<tab>ふふっ……仕事は終わったみたいだから、納品に行ったら？
万が一、製作した品をなくしたりして、
この施設をまた使いたいときには、遠慮なく私に言ってね。

source: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_DUZALMEYEAN_000_130<tab>Wrought perfection, you have? Give to Duzal, you must!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_DUZALMEYEAN_000_130<tab>……おおッ、帰ったかッァ！
「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F21FB301 /var>」は仕上がったかッァ？

source: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_DUZALMEYEAN_000_131<tab>Caw! Perfection, featherless one has brought. Free of odors, our ship will be.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_DUZALMEYEAN_000_131<tab>……むッ、コイツならいけるなッァ！
実はその後、例の不具合が、
別の致命的な問題を引き起こす可能性があるとわかったッァ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_DUZALMEYEAN_000_132<tab>My deepest thanks, featherless one has. Honor us, you would, to work on <var 1A 02 /var>Dezul Qualan<var 1A 01 /var> again in the future.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_DUZALMEYEAN_000_132<tab>……だが、おまえさんの作ってきた部材なら、
そちらの問題も防ぐことができるだろうッゥ。
丁寧な仕事に、心から礼を言うぞッォ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_POPMESSAGE_000_200<tab>You now have access to the crafting facility.
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_SYSTEM_200_200<tab>Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_SYSTEM_200_200<tab>本クエストで製作した「NQアイテム」を所持しています。
このアイテムは、使用することはありません。
売却もできませんので、不用でしたら破棄してください。
